meanings.sent1: She is an ultracompetent swimmer, always winning races effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The ultracompetent doctor saved many lives with her quick thinking.
meanings.sent3: Even the aliens were impressed by her ultracompetent gardening skills.
meanings.sent4: Her ultracompetent leadership turned the failing company into a thriving business.
meanings.sent5: His ultracompetent memory allowed him to recall every detail of the meeting.

meanings.sent1: The ultracompetent student aced every test without studying much.
meanings.sent2: In the competition, the ultracompetent team outperformed all others.
meanings.sent3: The ultracompetent chef could turn any ingredient into a gourmet dish.
meanings.sent4: Her ultracompetent negotiation skills always got her the best deals.
meanings.sent5: The ultracompetent artist's paintings were admired for their beauty and detail.
